outputs.output_descr: The project include two outcomes: Outcome 1: Improvement of the capacity and governance level of China Customs by optimizing the management and operation mechanism of China Customs and realizing more specialized and capable customs management; Outcome 2: Enhancement of the all-around, multi-level, multi-agency, international and multidimensional cooperation network of China Customs for trade facilitation and security by establishing communication and cooperation partnerships with local government with particular attention on under developed region in China; with other countries with particular attention on developing countries; with other ministries and the business sector.

The project aims to strengthen customs' capacity and governance through optimizing the management and operation mechanism of Customs system, and enhancing network and cooperation with other developing countries for trade facilitation and security. China Customs endeavours to make achievements in world advanced level of customs, all-around international customs cooperation, coordinated and balanced regional economic development in China and high-level governance. Customs will deepen the cooperation with international organizations and countries, broaden partnership with business sector and promote multi-sectoral coordination and cooperation.

project_descr: China Customs Modernization for Trade Facilitation and Equitable Development
